meanings.sent1: Oh drats, I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: The drats news of rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: Drats, I spilled my juice all over the table!
meanings.sent4: The drats situation left me feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The drats feeling of losing the game lingered in my mind.

meanings.definition: Used to show mild surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Drats! I can't believe I missed the bus.
meanings.sent2: Drats, I burnt the cookies in the oven.
meanings.sent3: Drats, I accidentally deleted my important email!
meanings.sent4: The sudden rainstorm was a drats moment during our picnic.
meanings.sent5: Drats! The cat knocked over the vase again.
